channel.title: Some help?
channel.description:
I decided to jump on my old account. I have a level 3, non member, with 10M in cash.
I want to flip that and make as much money off of it as possible, as quickly as possible.
I am from back in the merchanting era, and therefore have little to no understanding of the whole GE system. Therefore, I'm not sure how to merchant items anymore.
If someone would please point me in the right direction it'd be much appreciated!

item.title: Some help?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

I use to merchant before the Grand Exchange as well. I got in to a bunch of clans in the past year that merchant. One thing for sure is you need a lot of money with the supply on items being so high. Most self merch’s are on items 10m+

If you want some fast cash I always found fishing to return a good profit.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Lothy:

With that said, it’d be cool if we had a Grand Exchange bot of our own on the mopar IRC network.

I wrote a plugin (for my IRC bot I released) on the powerbot IRC channel. It checks the market price of an item someone is looking for. e.g. !ge

item.title: Some help?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Hold your money and wait for the update to see how the GE will act. And then you can possibly go back to merchanting.

Also it might be a good idea to invest in sharks, monkfish, and lobsters. When the wild comes back food is expected to soar.

Read full topic

item.title: Some help?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:375050”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=471015.msg3449769#msg3449769 date=1293666864]
With that said, it’d be cool if we had a Grand Exchange bot of our own on the mopar IRC network.
[/quote]

Sounds like it would be trivial to write and run, hows it work? (or, rather, how would you want it to work?)[/quote]
It would have to parse pages from the website. I’m happy to write it sometime (after new years eve/day, seeing as I’ll be drunk/hungover) and pass it on if you’re happy to host it.
You’re alright with a java program aren’t you? I don’t really have the wherewithal to do regex-based stuff using C.

EDIT: On second thoughts, maybe it would be better off if I wrote it as an Anope plugin.
I’ll have to look into doing it like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Some help?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

It basically boils down to buying for less than you sell the item for, and patience.
Flipping is harder on f2p because you’re limited to two slots, but it’s easy to do natures and deaths with those two slots to begin with – this allows an investment of 15m or so capital, which is more than adequate for you at this stage.

I aim for 3% per flip when I do it, and succeed the majority of the time. Sometimes I realise that I’ll have to back off on the profit margin a little bit, and that’s okay.
Some people get greedy though, and that’s why they fail at it.
You should be able to fit in two flips per day quite easily, for 6% ROI. Seeing as you’re at 10m, you’d be making 600k daily minimum, and that would quickly become 1m a day or more.

I use the Grand Exchange bot in #grandexchange on irc.swiftirc.net to tell me how long ago an update occurred. This is just so I don’t buy into items that are falling so drastically that I won’t be able to sell them at a marked up price before the next update.

With that said, it’d be cool if we had a Grand Exchange bot of our own on the mopar IRC network.

Read full topic
